Class OfficerRegistration

java.lang.Object
bto.EntitiesProjectRelated.OfficerRegistration
public class OfficerRegistration extends Object
The OfficerRegistration class represents a registration request from an HDB officer to work on a specific BTO project. It tracks the officer, project, and registration status.

Registration status can be one of three values:

  • PENDING - Initial status when an officer registers for a project
  • APPROVED - Status when a manager approves the registration
  • REJECTED - Status when a manager rejects the registration

  • Constructor Details

    • OfficerRegistration

      public OfficerRegistration()
      Default constructor for OfficerRegistration. Initializes the registration status to "PENDING".

    • OfficerRegistration

      public OfficerRegistration(HDBOfficer hdbOfficer, Project project)
      Parameterized constructor for OfficerRegistration. Creates a registration for a specific officer and project with a default status of "PENDING".
      Parameters:
      hdbOfficer - The HDB officer requesting registration
      project - The project the officer is registering for

  • Method Details

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()
      Gets the current registration status. Alias for getRegistrationStatus() for backward compatibility.
      Returns:
      The current registration status

    • updateStatus

      public boolean updateStatus(String status)
      Updates the registration status. Only allows changing to "APPROVED" or "REJECTED".
      Parameters:
      status - The new status to set
      Returns:
      true if the status was updated successfully, false if an invalid status was provided

    • getOfficerDetails

      public String getOfficerDetails()
      Gets the details of the officer associated with this registration.
      Returns:
      A string containing the officer's details

    • getProjectDetails

      Gets the details of the project associated with this registration.
      Returns:
      A string containing the project's details

    • getRegistrationStatus

      public String getRegistrationStatus()
      Gets the current registration status.
      Returns:
      The current registration status ("PENDING", "APPROVED", or "REJECTED")

    • setRegistrationStatus

      public void setRegistrationStatus(String registrationStatus)
      Sets the registration status. Only allows changing to "APPROVED" or "REJECTED". If an invalid status is provided, the status remains unchanged.
      Parameters:
      registrationStatus - The registration status to set
